Why get AWS Certified?
of organizations with AWS Certified staff say having that staff increases innovation with AWS services.
of IT leaders that employ AWS Certified staff say productivity improved, and 89% report faster troubleshooting.
Earn an industry-recognized credential
As of January 2025, there are more than 1.42 million active AWS Certifications and 1.05 million unique AWS Certified individuals.
